duties_responsibilities.duty: Leads projects related to regulatory compliance or improving facility or enterprise process/procedures.
Researches, interprets, and recommends unique solutions to current and evolving regulatory issues that will impact operations on a corporate or facility level.
Develops comprehensive programs to be utilized at facilities across a division or the enterprise.
Monitors periodic performance reports for trends and conditions, alerts line management to problems and makes recommendations for improvement.

skills.skill: Environmental Health and Safety Policy Compliance

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Environmental Health, Safety Engineering or related field (Master’s preferred)
CPS, CHMM, PE and NFPA 70E certifications a plus.
